title: Song Dynasty Divine Arrest System
alternative_title: Great Song Superior Lawman System ; Dà Sòng Shén Bǔ Xì Tǒng ; 大宋神捕系统 ; Da Song Shen Bu Xi Tong
status: Great Song Superior Lawman System ; Dà Sòng Shén Bǔ Xì Tǒng ; 大宋神捕系统 ; Da Song Shen Bu Xi Tong
description:
Description :
        Song Dynasty Divine Arrest SystemThe Golden Dragon King, the owner of Chongtian Village: "I tried my best to move forward, for the sake of ideals, beliefs, hard work, and strength to the end, but unexpectedly I became the lackey of the Zhao family's imperial clan. Now I can only shout for everyone, The traitors or bandits' reviled by thousands of people. Day by day, year after year, in this dark temple, I can only wait for you literati with lofty ideals. Come and take my head as the cornerstone of the right path!" Jia Shenzhu! If it were you, how would you choose?" A piece of court decree, thousands of liters of people's blood. In the turbulent times of Song Dynasty at the end of the reincarnation of the young man, he accompanied by the divine arrest system. justice? Selfish? How to choose?
